description.value: Gain one Minor Psychc Power. This power can be used without making a test and without risking Psychic Phenomena. Each session gain 1d10 - Willpower Bonus Random Psychic Powers across several disciplines. These do not require a test to manifest but automatically cause Psychic Phenomena.
